Questions asked in weekends might not be answered till Monday we are open 6 days a week Make payments to Pasadena Pawn Shop Office Hours: Monday - Friday: 10:00am to 5:00pm Saturdays: 11:00am to 3:00pm Sundays: Closed Auctions do not end early - Please don't Ask If you don't see a Buy It Now in our Ebay Listing - please don't ask me for one and do not ask me to end the auction for you if you need more pictures, please let me know. Thanks : MoSes We strive to make your eBay experience a good one. make every effort to list all of our items accurately Compatibility of any product is the purchasers' responsibility Please read the product ad carefully. We endeavor to list all available information in the ad, therefore, in many cases an item's specifications may have been obtained via the Internet. If you have any questions regarding this product please visit the manufacturer's web site or call their customer service before placing your bid. if you wish to stop by your self or send someone over to test or inspect the item. we are open 6 days a week and most any item is available for inspection, must be over 18 years of age: If you require more info regarding the condition of the item or need additional pictures please ask before bidding We are not a reaper center nor we reaper or refurbish merchandise our item's are sold AS IS & the auctions are final some of our auctions include a guaranty DOA if it's offered it will be posted above on the top of the page in items description, in that case if the guaranty is offered You have 1 day to return We strive to list all our items accurately, however, some of our items may have cosmetic imperfections such as case scratches, minor blemish and discoloration due to age, normal wear and tear, that do not in any way affect the performance of the unit. For these reasons, our Guaranty only covers the operation of the item and not the cosmetics. - shipping and insurance are not refundable in that case - ....: Payment Methods :.... Sorry if Paypal Can't OK your transaction we can't accept your payment, it will be refunded and we Will ask you to pay by Other Payment methods Local Pickups You Could Pay At Our Store With Paypal Credit Card Or Any Other Credit Card At The Time Of The Pickup. Please ! perches Tracking Service / traceable method. (UPS, FedEx, etc). - and provide the TR# / information after you send the payment will ship AFTER payment clears my bank Items will only be send to your credit card / payPal mailing address No COD's Absolutely No Credit Card Transactions From Indonesia & Malaysia -=- Turkey and Azerbaijan This is for our consumer's protection and it is a non-negotiable policy.I encourage you to carefully read the description, examine the photos, and ask any questions before you bid Please contact me regarding your peyment if your not sure of your payment before placing your bid Items will only be send to your payPal mailing address ALL INTERNATIONAL ORDERS REQUIRE A PHONE NUMBER PLEASE ENTER YOUR PHONE NUMBER IN OUR CHECKOUT SYSTEMS TRANSACTION NOTES Many countries impose their own customs, duties, taxes, etc. on items being shipped from a foreign country. We are not responsible for your country's imposed taxes and any other charges. SHIPPING INFORMATION: We ship most item(s) within 1-to-2 business days after payment is received and verified (UPS - USPS - FedEx - or Buyer's UPS Account #) Will Call for local buyers We process all of our orders 6 days a week and ship 3-to-4 x per week After end of the auction it will take a day or so to get the item professionally packaged we don't do our packaging - it's don by a professionals at next-door to our shop some large items might take extra day or so to make custom box's we will take our time to do the best job we can and get the items to you nice and safe Shipping and handling fee provided by me at the Ebay auction is only an Estimate of the Shipping cost for most of the time it will cover the US 48 stats At the conclusion of the auction please contact us within 24 hours by email or phone with your choice of payment method, shipping preference and mailing address. if no contact has been made in 3 days after end of the auction - we Reserve The right to re-list the item Unpaid auction wins will be forfeited seven (7) after days after end of the auction Non-Payer report will be filed with eBay to recover the closing fees of the auction. All California residents must pay 9% sales tax Thank you, for your interest in our EBay auctions Moses30 leaves feedback once you give feedback and an item is paid. Due to the number of sales we have on eBay, we have adopted a feedback policy that seems to work for our customers and ourselves. We go through our feedback file and submit feedback for those who have filed feedback on us. This policy ensures that everyone gets proper recognition and makes the process a bit smoother for both parties. If you are satisfied with our transaction, please leave a positive feedback and we will be sure to reciprocate when we do our updates. We leave positive feedback when items are paid for, simple as that. All unresolved bids will be reported to eBay and negative feed back will be made. In other words, we give feedback once you give feedback and have paid. Due to the volume of our sales, we can only leave feedback every so often. Please be patient with us, we will leave you feedback when we have the time. Pasadena Pawn Shop
Title: 2007 Epiphone DOT-CH-LH ES Cherry Red Left Hand Electric Guitar Semi Hollowbody
ConditionDescription: 2007 Epiphone DOT CH LH Cherry Red Left Hand Electric Guitar Semi Hollowbody, our guitar in good working order, appearance is fine, has some dings ( please see pictures), electronics work fine, no pic guard. found a  hard case for it, just to make sure it gets to you safer, condition of the case Used structurally strong, guitar fits nice and snug,   leather cover of the case showing signs of aging, please see pictures
